parameter.name: autoLinks
parameter.label: Simple Mode
parameter.description:
In simple mode, links and their according items are automatically created for new Things.

If the simple mode is turned off, the user has the full control about which items channels are linked to. Existing links will remain untouched.

parameter.name: period
parameter.label: Period
parameter.description: The period between successive firmware status info job execution.

parameter.name: delay
parameter.label: Delay
parameter.description: The time to delay the first firmware status info job execution.

parameter.name: timeUnit
parameter.label: Time unit
parameter.description: The time unit of the firmware status info job execution.
